dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Ah, a wandering samurai... You don't see many of your kind anymore. What brings you here?

choices.text: You don't seem like a local either. What's your story?

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (This place... the air tastes of regret and old blood.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Silent type, huh? I've met your kind before. The quiet ones always have the sharpest blades.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: This town was once a thriving haven for travelers. Merchants, monks, warriors... all passed through. But one night, shadows came from the woods, and everything changed.

choices.text: Enough stories. What do you want from me?

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (A vision flashes—screams, a blade cutting through mist, then silence.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: No one knows what they were—spirits, cursed souls, maybe worse. Those who fought them vanished. Now only echoes remain, and a tavern barely standing.

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (The weight of the blade feels heavier. Something here is... wrong.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Safe? Hah... Not really. One of the creatures still lingers nearby—by the old tavern ruins. Kill it, and maybe this place will sleep again.

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (The wind howls—or is it laughter?)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Me? I used to guard this road. Now I just... linger. The shadows took my purpose that night.

choices.text: Forget it. Tell me about the creature again.

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (You swipe a hand through Panda's form—it flickers like candlelight.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Not quite. More like... a memory. When the creature is gone, maybe I'll fade too.

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (But something pulls you back. A debt unpaid? Or curiosity?)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: If you're heading to the tavern ruins, be careful. The creature is not always in our world—it hides in the spirit world.

choices.text: How do I reach the spirit world?
[Draw your blade] 'Let it come to me.'

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (The steel glows faintly blue. It remembers how to cut spirits.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Use the 'T' key to shift between this world and the spirit world. But beware... the shift is not just visual—some things live only there.

choices.text: Understood. Why is the creature attacking the tavern?
Actually, tell me about yourself again.

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (The world splits—colors bleed, the tavern's ruins reform for a moment. Then pain. Something is WATCHING.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: At night, the barrier weakens. The creature slips through, haunting the tavern ruins. That's why it must be destroyed—fully, in the spirit world.

choices.text: [Breathe deeply] 'I'll need a drink after this.'

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (Panda smiles sadly. There hasn't been sake here for decades.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Good luck, Samurai. Help me put this place to rest, and I'll reward you with a healing potion.

choices.text: Wait, I forgot to ask something.

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: *Waves*

dialogues.name: Samurai
dialogues.text: (But you take the potion anyway. The living still need it.)

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: You've done it... The town is at peace again. I can't thank you enough.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Here, as promised. May this potion serve you well.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: I'll watch over the ruins a little longer... then join the others in the mist.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Some chains cannot be broken, Samurai. But I'm at peace now.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Still wandering around? You really like it here, huh?

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Well, you're always welcome to chat. I've got plenty of ghost stories.
